Archetype Feature Description: At 3rd level, you gain darkvision with a range of 60 feet. If you already have darkvision from your race, its range increases by 30 feet.
In addition, while in darkness, you are invisible to any creature that relies on darkvision to see you in that darkness.
Starting at 3rd level, you master the art of the ambush. You can give yourself a bonus to your initiative rolls equal to your Wisdom modifier.

At the start of your first turn of each combat, your walking speed increases by 10 feet, which lasts until the end of that turn. If you take the Attack action on that turn, you can make one additional weapon attack as part of that action.
If that attack hits, the target takes an extra 1d8 damage of the weapon's damage type. Additionally, the target can't take reactions until the end of your next turn.
Starting at 7th level, you gain proficiency in Wisdom saving throws if you don't already have it. If you already have proficiency, you gain expertise in Wisdom saving throws.
At 11th level, you gain the ability to make an additional attack with your Attack action when you use it to make two attacks.
If you already have Extra Attack and you use it to make three attacks, you can make a fourth attack as part of the same action.

Starting at 15th level, you can dodge in shadows, making it harder for enemies to pinpoint your location. When you take the Dodge action in dim light or darkness, you can take the Hide action as a bonus action.
